Workshop Invitation

Software Engineering in Industry 4.0 Ecosystems (SEI4E 2024)

About the Workshop

You are cordially invited to participate in the first workshop on Software Engineering in Industry 4.0 Ecosystems co-located with the 7th International Conference on Emerging Data and Industry (EDI40). In this workshop, we'll delve into the challenges posed by interdependent software components, including firmware, operating systems, libraries, programming languages, databases, frameworks, browsers, and other components. We'll explore on how to ensuring robust and working software systems in Industry 4.0. This workshop aims to address these intricate challenges and foster collaborative problem-solving within the software engineering community. The workshop provides a platform for researchers and industry experts to exchange ideas, present their work, and discuss innovations in this field, including topics, such as:

  • Ecosystem Software Backlog Prioritization and Effort Estimations
  • Ecosystem Software Implementation Coordination
  • Ecosystem Software Testing and Verification
  • Ecosystem Software Updates and Dependencies
  • Ecosystem Software Maintenance and Coordination
  • Ecosystem Software Security
  • AI Aided Software Engineering in Industry 4.0 Ecosystems

We welcome contributions in the form of short papers.

Important Information

  • Workshop Date: April 2024
  • Location: Hasselt, Belgium
  • Conference: The 7th International Conference on Emerging Data and Industry (EDI40)
  • Conference registration here

Submission Requirements

  • Paper should be no more than 6 pages in length.
  • Submission due date: January 19th, 2024
  • Author Notification: January 31th, 2024
  • Camera-ready due date: February 9th, 2024

Prospective authors are invited to submit original and unpublished papers. Papers should be submitted in PDF following the format the guidelines of Procedia Computer Science, MS Word Template, LaTeX, Template Generic, and have no more than 6 pages, including all figures and references.
